response.job_title: Game Programmer en C2 Game Studio
response.summary:
Systems Engineer from Colombia's National University. Game Programmer both professionally and as a hobby, developing different videogames since high school (more than 10 years ago!) in order to improve my abilities and knowledge.

Currently studying and developing different prototypes in Unreal Engine, as its currently stablished as the most influential and innovative game engine in the industry.

Interested on AI development which enrich gameplay experience and make environments feel more alive. Especially interested in Machine Learning and how it can be efficiently implemented into different game situations.

Passionate about videogames and playing all different genres in order to understand current development trends in the industry.

You can check what I've worked in here: https://santorloff.wixsite.com/orloff-gameportfolio
response.skills: Unreal Engine, C++, Programación de videojuegos, Desarrollo de videojuegos, Videojuegos, Desarrollo de software, Unity, C#

profile_positions.description:
Design, develop and implement academic activities with apps for Android and iOS devices.

Maintain and solve problems in previously created backend.

Provide customer support via e-mail and phone.
profile_positions.title: Ingeniero de software

profile_positions.description:
Implement and optimize all functionalities related to the desired gameplay experience, which consisted on an interactive app to teach how to play the guitar, aimed for children.

Implement Canvas animations and flow control for different user scenarios.

Simulate guitar sound with additive chords, each chord generating different tones in each individual fret.

Creation of a generic lesson with dialogue template, allowing to quickly design and implement multiple lessons without additional changes to code.
profile_positions.title: Game Programmer

company.name: C2 Game Studio
company.description:
C2 is a game developer studio located in Medellin, Colombia with more than 15 years of experience delivering high quality game experiences.

C2 pedigree starts with AAA experience earned during its Founder’s time at Digipen and then a career at a renowned developer. Founded in 2008 with the purpose of slowly growing a game studio capable of tackling complex projects and crafting incredible experiences like the ones that constantly inspire us as creators and fans of video games. With this end goal in mind and with passion, commitment and ambition deeply rooted into our DNA we’ve raised our own bar game after game, never settling, always striving to improve, always punching above our weight.
